Mung was born in 1956. She has three children, who have all gotten married. Her husband is a farmer. She grows vegetables and fruit trees for a living. She gets 3,000,000 VND a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 5,000,000 VND per month. 

Mung has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2006. In the last cycle she borrowed 9,810,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 VND to buy vegetable seeds to grow. She always wants to enlarge her farm, diversifying the vegetables she grows. Mung wishes she can save enough money for retirement.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds to grow.

loans.name: Sophorn's Group

texts.en:
A 40-year-old mother of three schoolchildren, Sophorn strives for a living through rice farming. With 15 years of experience in this business, she is able to earn about 24,000 KHR per day. 

Five loans ago (which she completely paid back), Sophorn was in the first-cycle loan with VisionFund, Kiva's partner. She has wisely used her past loans to expand her business gradually and upgrade her living conditions. 

Since hygienic practice is one of the crucial factors for maintaining the family's harmony, she formed a group of six to apply for a loan. Specifically, her loan is the latrine loan. The requested loan amount for this entire group is 200,000 KHR each. As the leader, Sophorn is going to use her loan in order to build a decent latrine for her family, especially her children, including a latrine slab, cement, sand, etc. She highly hopes that she will have a proper latrine in her household, so all of her children can have good health practices and prevent relevant diseases.

loans.use: To build a decent latrine.

loans.name: Chhoeum's Group

texts.en:
A 41-year-old local farmer originally from the Bovel district of Battambang Province, Chhoeum is married and a mother of five children. Only four children are dependent on her as one of them is a student, and the remaining three are helping the family's business. She has been involved in this business for 5 years and is able to earn about 22,000 KHR per day. However, her entire household does not have a proper latrine for usage. 

Therefore, she is forming a group of two to apply for a new loan. Choeum's group consists of two female members as sixth-cycle loan borrowers, and she is the leader. With success, she has paid back loans and that has helped her to sustain her business and cover her daily costs of living. 

Now, she and her co-member are seeking the same loan amount of 200,000 KHR each. Chhoeum is going to use her portion to buy the above-the-ground materials for latrine construction, such as zinc, cement, bricks, a latrine slab, etc.  She hopes that all of her children will have good health.

loans.use: To buy the above-the-ground materials for constructing a proper latrine.

loans.name: Hiep

texts.en:
Hiep was born in 1977. She has two children who currently attend primary and secondary schools. Her husband works as a doorman for a bank. His income is about 4,000,000 VND per month.

Hiep grows rice and raises pigs and chickens to earn a living. She earns 3,000,000 VND from it every month. Her family’s total earnings are about 7,000,000 VND per month.

She has been participating in SEDA's credit program since 2009. In the last cycle she borrowed 7,630,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle she would like to borrow 8,502,000 VND to buy feed for pigs and chickens.

For the future she wants to let her children go to school until higher education and enlarge her farm.

loans.use: to buy feed for pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Yeko

texts.en: Yeko is a 36-year-old married man with five children living in Masindi, Uganda. For eight years, he has been trading in agricultural produce and he got the initial capital from farming, which he still practices. Price fluctuation and inflation hinders his business while his dreams are to educate his children up to the university level, build a permanent home, diversify the business to include cattle trade, and venture into modern farming methods. Yeko intends to use the loan to buy maize and sunflower to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize and sunflower to sell.

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy was born in 1971. She has two children. Her son is a worker. Her daughter is learning at high school. Her husband is a constructor. Thuy sells traditional noodles for a living. She gains from it 3,500,000 VND a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 10,000,000 VND per month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2006. In the last cycle she borrowed 6,322,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 7,630,000 VND to make noodles. Her dream is to support her children's higher education and to upgrade her food stall.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make noodles.

loans.name: Silvestre

texts.en:
When Silvestre decided to give back to Harlingen and the surrounding communities, he considered forming a non-profit organization but said there is normally a higher inconsistency rate as there is not enough room to direct, which hinders a successful process. 

Kings, Queens & Scholars Magazine, which focuses on excellence in education, quickly sold out on its first day of publication in 1994, but its success ended in 1999 when Silvestre was promoted in his career as a Federal officer. “With the constant traveling, I didn't have time to dedicate to my publication,” he says. Silvestre funded the magazine because he saw students and parents needed assistance and guidance during their exiting years of high school. 

The original format focused on academia instead of sports, but when considering rekindling the magazine, Silvestre decided to include sports and incorporate stories written by educators, attorneys, dentists and other professionals sharing how they continued their education to obtain their jobs. Silvestre says this process helps students by reinforcing the importance of staying in school and continuing after graduation. “We’re valley wide ranging from South Padre Island to Rio Grande City,” he said.

Currently, the majority of the magazine’s content derives from journalism students, which gives them an opportunity to publish their work and gives Silvestre the ability to completely cover the valley. Silvestre employs a photographer, who also teaches, a design graduate who works on the design elements and his son as the publisher and computer technician. “We do a lot for the community” he says. “We’re helping and guiding students, teachers, and parents with information about colleges, scholarships and the like,” he says. “It’s to help the community. This is our way of thanking everyone who has helped us, and giving back to the community.”

After hearing about Accion Texas Inc. from The Harlingen Economic Development Corporation and the City of Harlingen, Silvestre contacted Accion for a loan. He says the loan will tremendously assist the magazine in a very positive way as he was able to purchase computers, cameras, chargers, batteries and a printer to continue production. The magazine is published bi-monthly. Silvestre expects to keep this pattern until about March 2013, when he feels he will be able to reach his goal of publishing monthly. “We’re currently building our clientele,” he says. Visit Kings Queens & Scholars Magazine’ website for more information at: http://kingsqueensandscholars.com/; or view their Facebook page at: https://www.facebook.com/KingsQueensScholarsMagazine.

loans.use: To purchase equipment and continue his publishing job

loans.name: Oyunbold

texts.en: Oyunbold is 33 years old, and lives with his wife and an 11-year-old only daughter in his wooden house in Darkhan, the second largest city of Mongolia. He has been running a taxi business in his hometown for five years and earns twenty dollars throughout the day. At the moment, his wife doesn’t have a job, so she cares for her daughter at home. Oyunbold and his wife are planning to rent a counter in a bazaar to increase their family income. His wife will manage the counter, because she has experience. Before, his wife used to work at a counter by taking cash for others. A friend of his wife, who rents a counter in a bazaar for several years, has agreed to go to the nearest border of China with his wife and will teach her where, what, and how to buy goods. The loan Oyunbold is taking will be used to buy some goods and to rent a dress counter in order to increase his family income. By doing this, Oyunbold’s family can increase their income and can save the money for their daughter’s education.

loans.use: to buy some goods and rent a dress counter in order to increase his family income.

loans.name: Nyamvula

texts.en:
Nyamvula, 36 years, is married and has three children. She is very hardworking. She used to generate income selling little household products in a small kiosk. Currently, Nyamvula operates a cafe where she sells foods and drinks for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. She says that her business is doing very well. The challenge is that she does not have enough capital to expand her business.

She’s had two Yehu loans to date and is grateful for the support provided. This current loan is for 10,890 KES, which she’ll use to buy more ingredients like flour, meat, raw potatoes, sugar, vegetables, etc to improve her business. Her goal is to always keep her business active to generate income to help with her children’s schooling costs.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients like flour, meat, raw potatoes, sugar, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is aged 62. She is a farmer in Litein County in Kenya, where she has been practicing mixed farming for the past 15 years by producing maize and tea that she sells locally. She also buys and sells maize as an additional source of income.

She is requesting a 50,000 KES (Kenyan shilling) loan from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase a water tank, which will help her in irrigating her crops and increasing her produce and income, which will help improve her living standards. 

She believes her business will have grown enough to buy maize using a pickup in the next five years.

Lack of a readily available market and capital are the main challenges she is facing in farming.

loans.use: To purchase a water tank.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en: Fe is a thirty-year-old married woman from Panglao, Bohol. She has two children. The oldest child is seven while the youngest is five. She raises hogs. She has been in the hog raising business for one year. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase additional piglets, feeds, and pig supplement. In the future, Fe would like to invest in other ventures to earn in order to support the education of her children for their bright future.

loans.use: to buy feeds and pig supplement.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 30 years old. He is married to Jacinta and together they have a five-year-old child. He has been in motorcycle transport for the past three years.

This will be his second loan from KADET LTD. He repaid his previous loan well and in good time. He will use the loan amount to purchase another motorcycle, to boost his business.

He hopes to purchase a taxi vehicle which he believes will improve his living standard.

loans.use: to purchase another motorcycle

loans.name: Xuan

texts.en:
Xuan was born in 1964. She has two children who are adults. Her husband is a bronze craftsman. Xuan grows rice and raises pigs and chickens for a living. She gains 2,000,000 VND (Vietnamese dong) per month. Her family’s total earnings are about 9,000,000 VND per month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2007. In the last loan cycle, she borrowed 7,630,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 8,502,000 VND to buy food for the chickens and pigs. Her dream is that her children can go to higher education and that she can upgrade her farm.

loans.use: to buy food for the chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Orgil-Erdene

texts.en:
Mr. Orgil-Erdene is 26 years old and lives with his wife and two children in their wooden house in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Since 2010, he has worked as an electrical engineer at a local company. His wife works as a shop assistant. 

A couple of years ago, he built a wooden house. He is asking for 2,500,000 MNT (Mongolian tugriks) to set in a floor heating system. By doing this, his house will be warm and comfortable, and they will burn less coal than usual. And also, his children can play on the floor with him.

loans.use: to set in a floor heating system so he will burn less coal than usual.

loans.name: Nguyen

texts.en:
Nguyen was born in 1977. She has two children who are learning at secondary school and primary school. Her husband is a mechanic. He gets 6,000,000 VND per month. 

Nguyen is a leather worker. Her salary is about 3,000,000 VND. Her family’s total earnings are about 9,000,000 VND per month.
 
She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2006. In the last cycle she borrowed 8,502,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. 

In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 VND to buy food for chickens and pigs. She wants to raise her children well and enlarge her farm.

loans.use: to buy food for chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is aged fifty-one and is a farmer in Litein county in Kenya where she lives with her husband and six children; only four of them are still schooling. She has been in farming for twenty years, producing tea and milk, which she sells to the people in her locality.

She is requesting a 40,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase poultry birds which will work as additional income for her and improve her living standards and also provide income for her children’s school fees. Nancy aspires to have built a modern dairy unit for her dairy cows in the next five years.

Pests and diseases are her major challenge in farming.

Nancy is grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for lending her the loan.

loans.use: To purchase poultry

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase materials for constructing a dairy unit.

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en:
Sharon is a married woman. She has four children. She describes herself as honest. She operates a retail business where she sells water. She has been involved in this business for four years. Her business is located at an urban business area and her primary customers are local residents. 

Sharon describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to boost her retail water business. Her business goal is to be a successful businesswoman  within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will improve her business. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to boost her water retailing business

loans.name: Nguyen

texts.en:
Nguyen was born in 1957. She has two children who have got married. Her husband and she have a grocery store to earn a living. From it, she earns 3,000,000 VND a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 6,000,000 VND per month. 

Nguyen has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2006. In the last cycle she borrowed 8,502,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 VND to buy candies, milk, beverages, and rice for her grocery store. She always wanted to raise her children  well so they can get a job in the future. She also wants to save enough money for her retirement.

loans.use: to buy candies, milk, beverages, and rice for her grocery store.

loans.name: Victor

texts.en:
Victor, 38, is a farmer in Litein County in Kenya where he lives with his wife and four children, three of whom are attending school.

He has been in farming for the past eight years, producing tea, milk and vegetables, which he sells in his locality.

He is requesting a 50,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase materials for constructing a greenhouse, which will help in improving his production. This will increase his income and help him to pay for his children’s schooling and basic needs. He hopes to raise the number of his cows to three in the next five years.

Lack of adequate transport for his products and high competition are his major challenges in farming.

Victor is grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for lending him the loan.

loans.use: to purchase materials for constructing a greenhouse.

loans.name: Tsengelmaa

texts.en:
Tsengelmaa, 38, lives with her husband and two children in her wooden house in the ger district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. This area has no running water, minimal roads and spotty electricity. 

Tsengelmaa has been a mathematics teacher in secondary school for seven years. Her husband runs a taxi business. 

This summer, her family built a house, but it is not finished. They need more construction material. So before the winter she is planning to reconstruct her house and to thicken the walls with materials that keep the heat as long as possible. She will use brick to thicken house walls from the outside and basalt wool from the inside. By doing this, she can cut the use of charcoal by several times compared to her current house. 

She is requesting a 5,000,000 MNT loan. The loan Tsengelmaa is taking will be used to thicken her house walls and to repair her house.

loans.use: to thicken her house walls and to repair her house.

loans.name: Alex

texts.en:
Alex, 26, lives with his life companion and their son. He sells home products like bowls, basins, jugs, etc. He’s been in business several years and has much sales experience that allows him to earn good profits. He has a locale in one of the busy trading centers. He has quite a number of regular customers who prefer him because everything he sells is quality at affordable prices.

Alex is a man who is dedicated to his work; he’s very active and tenacious and is always looking for opportunities that will allow him to find the road to success. He is currently asking for a loan so as to buy more merchandise like basins, cups, plates, bowels, etc.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise like basins, cups, plates, bowls, etc.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
This young woman is 28 years old and has the will to move forward. She has set many good goals, and one of them is to distance herself from the social violence that her area is the victim of. To this end, she has looked for good alternatives, like selling utensils such as cooking pans, cups, mugs, and plates, among others. She has gained a lot of customers because people prefer her for the quality of her products, the good prices, and above all the excellent service. 

Agnes is an enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work. She is determined and wants a more prosperous future. Every day she works to earn it. She is very happy and comfortable with her business. These last few weeks, the demand has gone up. So she decided to make a new investment but she doesn't have enough capital. This is why she is applying for a loan from Yehu that will allow her to buy household spoons, mugs, cooking pans, jugs, etc.

loans.use: to buy household spoons, mugs, cooking pans, jugs, etc.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys, 38, is a farmer in Litein county in Kenya where she lives with her husband and four children, three of whom are schooling.

She has been in farming for ten years, producing potatoes, milk and tea, which she sells to the people around her area. She also runs a motorbike transportation business as an additional source of income.

She is requesting a 60,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase materials for constructing a greenhouse. This will improve her farm produce, bringing more income that will help her in paying for her children's school fees.

Insufficient dairy feeds and diseases are her major challenges in farming.

Gladys is thankful to Juhudi Kilimo for giving her the loan.

loans.use: To purchase materials to construct a greenhouse.

loans.name: Davaasuren

texts.en: Mr. Davaasuren is 42 years old and lives with his wife and two sons in Ger in Arhangai province, Mongolia. His wife, Nasandelger, 35, operates a small business of her own. His sons, Bat-Erdene and Otgonbayar, are 16 and 13. They are secondary school students. He has been engaging in various activities since 2006. He is now starting his own retail business to sell clothing and other goods. Because of the business profits and potential expansion opportunities he has projected, he has chosen to proceed with this business. He is a diligent, hardworking and responsible man. He needs 4,000,000 MNT to purchase clothing and other goods to resell at retail prices at his rented counter.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and other goods to resell at retail prices at his rented counter.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
Miriam, 37, lives in the Coastal region of Kenya with her husband and three children. She’s very hardworking. She’s been selling a variety of merchandise like foodstuffs, kitchenware, etc.

She has a locale at the market, and she has established a good customer base.

Miriam has requested a 50,000 KES (Kenyan shillings) loan to stock up on merchandise. She’s going to buy more foodstuffs and household items to sell, among other commodities. Her goal is to work hard to improve her sales and income to help pay for her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy more foodstuffs and household items to sell, among other commodities.

loans.name: Kathure

texts.en:
Kathure is a married woman. She has two children. She describes herself to be a humble woman. She operates a grocery store where she sells vegetables and fruits. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located at an urban area, and her primary customers are local residents. 

She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. She will use the 20,000 Kes (Kenyan shillings) loan to buy vegetables and fruits. Her business goal is to be a successful businesswoman within five years. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: Fatimahon

texts.ru: Фатимахон 44 года, замужем, имеет 5 детей. Две дочери Фатимахон замужем, троя детей учаться в школе. Фатимахон в качестве дохода для своей семьи, занимается торговлей одежды на местном рынке. Торговлей Фатимахон занимается в течении 10 лет. Начала она свой бизнес с 100,000 сом Благодаря упорному труду Фатимахон, ее деятельность позволяет приносить около 20,000 сом в месяц, что служит основой для покрытия расходов на питание и бытовые нужды семьи. Учитывая особую приветливость хозяйки и хороший ассортимент товаров, Фатимахон имеет большое количество постаянных клиентов, что потребовало участия всей ее семьи в бизнесе. На сегодняшний день на базаре Фатимахон  помогает дочка, а также муж оказывает посильную поддержку. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Фатимахон обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку зимних товаров и увеличение оборотных средств. Доходы от кредита Фатимахон планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего бизнеса, чтобы в перспективе построить большой дом для своей семьи.
texts.en:
Fatimahon is forty-four, married, and has five children.  Two of her daughters are married, and three of the children are in school.  For the past ten years, she has been selling clothing at the local market to earn a good living for her family.  She started the business with 100,000KGS, and thanks to her  own tenacity, the business brings in around 20,000KGS per month, which covers the family's food and household expenses. Because she's a particularly affable proprietor and offers a nice assortment of goods, Fatimahon has a quite a few steady customers, requiring the whole family to take part in the business.  These days Fatimahon's daughter helps her out at the market, and her husband offers his support, too.  

To further develop her business, Fatimahon has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 100,000KGS in order to purchase merchandise and increase working capital.  She  plans to use the income from the loan to improve the business so she can build a big home for her family.

loans.use: to buy winter clothing to sell.

loans.name: Ganbaatar

texts.en:
Mr. Ganbaatar is 53 years old and lives with his wife in their wooden house in Darkhan, the second largest city in Mongolia. They have two daughters who live on the other side of Darkhan. He has a job in a steel factory in Darkhan. His wife is pensioner. 

Their wooden house is small and old. Before the winter comes, they need to repair their house. Otherwise, they need to use more coal to stay warm. This is the explanation of why Mongolia is one of the worst countries for air pollution.  

Mr. Ganbaatar said that they need to consume 10 tons of coal to overcome the cold days of the winter. That means the same amount of carbon dioxide will be emitted into the environment. So he is requesting 2,000,000 MNT to buy construction materials such as glass-wool, bricks, cement, paint, and  windows.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, such as glass-wool, bricks, cement, paint, and windows.

loans.name: Geoffrey

texts.en:
Geoffrey, 30, is a farmer in Litein county in Kenya. He has been practicing mixed farming for the past six years, producing tea, pineapples and milk, which he sells to the people around his local area. He also works in a hotel, which helps him get an additional income.

He is requesting a 50,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase a water tank that will help him in irrigating his crops. This will lead to having more produce and hence more income that will help him improve his living standards in future. He plans to have bought a more productive cow in the next five years.

Competition and lack of a readily available market for his produce is his main challenge in farming.

loans.use: To purchase a water tank.

loans.name: Khishigdelger

texts.en:
Khishigdelger, who is 44, runs a small translation bureau with her husband in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. In a day she translates approximately 25-30 pages. She knows English, Russian and German. She has been running her business for nine years and has gained a lot of experience from her business. 

She used her first loan used to purchase the necessary building materials for her apartment repair. They did the apartment repair and she is so thankful that Kiva give her the opportunity to repair the apartment. Now her living condition is very comfortable. 

But they have another problem with the apartment's plumbing. Khishigdelger is requesting 3,000,000 MNT loan to change the plumbing system in her apartment so that she can have clean water.

loans.use: to change the engineering system in her old apartment.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora is a married woman. She has one child. She describes herself to be a humble woman. She operates a retail store where she sells home products. She has been involved in this business for seven years. Her business is located at an urban area, and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. 

Flora will use the 20,000 Kes (Kenyan shillings) loan to buy home products. Her business goal is to be a successful businesswoman within five years. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy home products.

loans.name: Vancy

texts.en:
Vancy, 39, is a farmer in Litein county in Kenya,  where she lives with her husband and three children, who are all schooling.

She has been practicing farming for the past six years, producing tea and milk, which she sells to the people around her local area. She sells her tea to K.T.D.A as an additional source of income.

She is requesting a 30,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase poultry birds. These will help her improve her income pay for her children’s school fees.

She plans to have acquired two more quality cows that will be producing fifteen litres of milk per day in five years time.

Lack of enough dairy feeds and diseases are her major challenges in farming.

She is very grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for giving her the loan.

loans.use: To purchase poultry.

loans.name: Vigilance

texts.en:
Vigilance, 34 years old, is a single mother who has one 9-year-old child.  

Her economic activity is the preparation and sale of food, and she has had this business for one year. It has been the livelihood for her and her child -- the way she gets ahead as a single mother.

The business is located in her home. The sales are made by cash and on credit to neighbors and people who work and walk in the town center. This point of sale is very helpful to obtain better profits.

She wants the financing to invest in working capital and to buy products for the preparation of her foods such as rice, beans, oil, condiments, vegetables, and beef. 

She appreciates the help provided by Kiva lenders to people with limited resources in poor countries such as Kenya, so they can have decent means to work.

loans.use: to buy products for food preparation such as rice, beans, oil, condiments, vegetables, and beef.

loans.name: Tinh

texts.en:
Tinh was born in 1961. She has four children. Her oldest daughter is married. Her youngest daughter is studying at the University School of Medicine. Her youngest two children are studying in secondary school and primary school. She and her husband grow rice and raise chickens and pigs to earn a living. They have been engaged in this work for ten years. Her family’s total earnings are about 4,000,000 VND per month. 
She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2006. In the last cycle, she borrowed 6,322,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 6,758,000 VND to buy food for chickens, ducks and musk ducks. She wants her children to keep going to school till higher education.

loans.use: to buy food for chickens, ducks and musk ducks.

loans.name: Phuong

texts.en:
Phuong was born in 1971. She has two children who are in the 11th grade and the 5th grade. Her husband works in construction to earn a living. She is a farmer. Her family’s total earnings are about 6,000,000 VND per month. 
She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2006. In the last cycle, she borrowed 8,502,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 8,502,000 VND to buy food for chickens and pigs. She wants to use her profit to raise her children well.

loans.use: to buy food for chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en: Regina is a married woman. She has three children. She describes herself to be a humble woman. She operates a retail store where she sells products such as sugar, flour, salt, etc . She has been involved in this business for seven years. Her business is located at an urban area, and her primary customers are local residents and daily consumers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. She will use the 15,000 KES loan to buy more inventory of home products. Her business goal is to be a successful businesswoman within five years. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy home products

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: En el mundo hay personas con deseos y aspiraciones para superar las mas grandes adversidades a las que somete la pobreza y provocadas por la violencia social; optar por trabajar honradamente visualizando un mejor futuro para sus hijos es la mejor opción de esta mujer, reside con su compañero de vida y su hija que es menor de edad. Es una mujer luchadora, su mayor sueño es ofrecer a su familia mejores oportunidades de vida en el corto tiempo. Actualmente se dedica a vender de forma ambulante: perfumería, telas, cosméticos y enchape de oro y plata, es así como día a día lleva el sustento diario a su casa y subsisten. Le alegra mucho despertarse cada mañana, y salir de su casa a trabajar para que el día de mañana su hija vea los frutos de su esfuerzo.Desea tener mas variedad de producto, pero lamentablemente no tiene el  capital suficiente para llevar a cabo este sueño, es por eso, que se acerca a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y comprar mas cremas, diferentes tipo de telas, cosméticos en variedad y así lograr  cumplir una meta mas para ella y su familia. Cuenta con la seguridad que pronto saldrá de la deuda adquirida y agradece de antemano por la ayuda.
texts.en:
In the world there are people with wishes and hopes to overcome the greatest adversities caused by poverty and social unrests.  They opt to work honestly visualizing a better future for their children.  

This is the best option for the client.  She lives with her life companion and young daughter.  She’s a tenacious woman whose greatest dream is to offer her minor children better life opportunities.  She currently sells perfumery, fabric, cosmetics, silver and gold plated jewelry from place to place.  This is how she provides daily sustenance for her home and they live in peace.  It gladdens her very much to awaken every morning and leave her house so that her daughter will enjoy the fruits of her labor in the future.

She wants to have more variety of products but unfortunately does not have sufficient capital to make this dream reality which is why she’s approached Integral to request a loan to buy more creams, different type of fabrics and a variety of cosmetics to reach one more goal she has for her and her family.  She hopes to repay the loan quickly and gives thanks in advance for the help.

loans.use: to buy more creams, different types of fabric and a variety of cosmetics.

loans.name: Lkhagva-Ochir

texts.en:
Mr. Lkhagva-Ochir, 31, is a single man who lives with his grandmother, mother and younger sister. Since 2011, he has been working as an auto engineer at a local company. He is an open-minded, hardworking guy who has high goals for himself. However, his mother and grandmother are pensioners, and Lkhagva-ochir is the one who earns income for his family. They live in a ger, a traditional Mongolian tent. As you know, Mongolia is one of the coldest countries in the world and borders with Siberia to the north. Before the winter comes, they need to change their old ger. 
They use coal to stay warm. This explains why Mongolia is one of the worst countries in the world for air pollution.  He says that they consume 6 tons of coal to overcome the cold in the winter. This determines the amount of carbon dioxide they emit into the environment. Lkhagva-Ochir is requesting a loan of 2,300,000 MNT to buy a new ger. By doing this, his ger will be warm and comfortable, and they will burn less coal.

loans.use: buy new a new ger (a traditional Mongolian tent).

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Siempre hay nuevas esperanza para todo aquel que se proponga vivir u nuevo día, y así poder lograr metas e intereses para su familia, superando la violencia social, ese es el caso de esta mujer que vive junto a su madre e hijo que es su mayor tesoro, su esposo reside en Estados Unidos y le ayuda un poco económicamente, pero no lo suficiente para cubrir todas las necesidades del hogar. Es una mujer luchadora que su empeño es dar lo mejor de si misma, para que a su familia no le falte lo necesario para la subsistencia. Actualmente trabaja vendiendo comida en una zona del país, posee un pequeño puesto en donde con la ayuda de su madre y su hijo logra tener un día exitoso, lleno de trabajo. Cuenta con la satisfacción de tener clientela fija ya que el lugar esta ubicado cerca de una zona industrial y esto hace que a la hora del almuerzo cada trabajador llegue a comprar ya que es la única persona con precios accesibles, La cliente desea ampliar su puesto es decir comprar mesas, sillas, mas materia prima para variar su menú y tener un poco de mas entrada económicamente, pero no cuenta con los suficientes ingresos para esta inversión, es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y poder comprar lo dicho; agradece la ayuda anticipadamente y espera poder solventar la deuda lo antes posible.
texts.en:
There is always new hope for those who make up their minds to live another day so that they can fulfill their goals and plans for their families, overcoming violence in society. This is the case with this woman, who lives together with her mother and her son, who is her greatest treasure. Her husband lives in the United States and helps her a little bit with finances, but not enough to cover all the household expenses. She is a determined woman whose pledge is to give the best of herself so that her family will not lack the necessities of life. 

Currently, she works selling food in an area of the country. She has a small stand where, with the help of her mother and her son, she manages to have successful, work-filled days. She tells of the satisfaction of having a regular clientele; her place is located close to an industrial zone, which means that at lunchtime, every worker arrives at her stand to buy lunch because she is the only person with reasonable prices. 

The borrower wishes to expand her food stand by buying tables, chairs, and more raw ingredients so that she can vary her menu and have a little more money coming in. She doesn't have enough money for this investment, and that's why she approached INTEGRAL to request a loan to buy those items. She gives her thanks in advance and hopes to be able to pay back the debt as soon as possible.

loans.use: for the purchase of tables, chairs, and ingredients.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 73 years old. He is married to Juliah, a housewife. He is a carpenter and has been in the business for the past 20 years.

This is his first loan from KADET LTD. He was introduced to us by one of our field officers. He will use the loan amount to purchase more timber for use in his business. He hopes to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to buy more timber for carpentry work

loans.name: Juhudi Baco Group

texts.en:
Justin is the chairman of the Community Bank named “Juhudi BaCo” which is composed of nine members united in solidarity for receiving Kiva loans with the goal of developing their businesses.

Justin, 36, became a micro-entrepreneur in 2005. He manages his own general store in the North of the city of Lubumbashi which is located to the South-east of the DRCongo. Justin works hard with good management skills in order to realize his dream of one day opening a bakery in his area. His business generates a profit of US$150 per week. 

Justin is a trustworthy client of the MFI HOPE RDC, having twelve times received and correctly repaid loans. He will increase his stock of merchandise with his next loan by purchasing, soap, vegetable oil, sacks of rice, etc... and reselling them at a profit. Justin is married and the father of a son who is seven months old. He likes being HOPE’s client.

loans.use: to increase his store’s stock by buying soap, vegetable oil, sacks of rice, etc... to resell at profit.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Deseos de superación y siempre brindar lo mejor a su familia, son razones para que cada mañana éste hombre renueve ilusiones y esperanzas a fin de superar la pobreza y evitar la violencia social de la que pueden ser victimas miembros de su familia, es muy humilde, trabajador, honesto y emprendedor, cualidades que sus vecinos comentan. Siempre buscando los mejores beneficios para su familia, actualmente de dedica a la venta y elaboración de ladrillos es así como junto a su hijo y sus suegros se ganan la vida y salen a trabajar para brindar lo mejor de si, y desde ya, ser ejemplo de como se debe ganar la vida honradamente para quienes lo miran. Desea invertir en materia prima necesaria para elaborar sus ladrillos como barro y leña y así obtener mas ganancias, pero no posee de suficientes ingresos propios para llevar a cabo este sueño e incrementar sus ganancias, ya que sus productos son bien demandados, es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así poder comprar leña y barro, y diversos materiales que le servirán para seguir elaborando mayor cantidad de ladrillos. Cuenta con la esperanza de que no estará solo en su anhelo y podrá cumplir su meta antes de tiempo.
texts.en:
The desire to overcome and provide the best for his family are the reasons why each dawn brings him new hopes and dreams to overcome poverty and avoid social unrest that can victimize his family members. 

He’s very humble, hardworking, honest and enterprising - all qualities his neighbors comment about.  He’s always sought the best for his family and currently works making and selling bricks.  This is how he, his son and his in-laws earn their living and they go out to work in order to give their best and set an example for anyone looking at him of the way to earn one’s living honorably.

He wants to invest in materials like clay and firewood needed to manufacture bricks to earn higher profits but does not have enough income of his own to make this dream reality and to increase his profits.  Because his products are in high demand, though, he’s approached Integral to request a loan to be able to buy clay and firewood and various other materials that will make it possible for him to continue manufacturing larger amounts of bricks.  He hopes that he’s not alone with his wish and that he’ll be able to reach his goal ahead of time.

loans.use: to buy firewood and clay.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Cada persona en el mundo desea vivir con dignidad y alegría es así como este hombre se rebusca por su familia conformada por su esposa y un hijo, para brindarles lo mejor, en medio de tanta violencia social y pobreza, es por eso que cada mañana busca la manera de salir a trabajar teniendo en mente que en su mesa no debe de faltar el pan de cada día. Él es muy trabajador, honesto, sincero, y muy emprendedor ya que es el hombre del hogar y siente la carga de ser ejemplo para su hijo. Actualmente se dedica a la elaboración y venta de zapatos artesanales es decir hechos por el mismo, tiene una pequeña venta ubicada en una zona transitada del país y es ahí donde cada mañana sale a vender para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Como buen comerciante ha identificado el momento de incrementar su venta, es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL  para solicitar un crédito y así poder comprar: Cuero, pega de zapatos y herramientas de trabajo. Esta seguro que su necesidad podría ser escuchada y personas de buen corazón harían cumplir su sueño.
texts.en:
Everyone in the world wants to live with dignity and joy.  This is how this man strives so that his family, his wife and son, can have the best amidst so much poverty and need.  This is why he seeks every morning to find the way to go out to work keeping in mind that his table must never lack daily bread.

He’s very hardworking, honest, sincere and very enterprising because he’s the man of the house and feels the weight of setting an example for his son.  He currently works manufacturing and selling artisanal shoes, that is, those made by himself.  He has a small sales stand located in a very busy part of the country which is where he heads to every morning to sell and provide sustenance for his home.

Like any good merchant, though, he’s identified the moment to increase sales a bit and this is why he’s approached Integral to request a loan to buy leather, shoe glue and work tools.  He’s sure that his need will be heard and good-hearted people will see that his dream becomes reality.

loans.use: to buy leather, shoe glue, work tools, etc.

loans.name: Isaac

texts.en:
Isaac is a 48-year-old married man. He has two children, ages 15 and 18 years. He describes himself to be a humble and caring man. He operates a retail store where he sells stationery and provides services such as photocopy, typing, scanning, etc. 

Isaac has been involved in this business for 10 years. His business is located at an urban area and his primary customers are students, schools and hotels. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of funds for improving the business. He will use the Kes 25,000 loan to buy stationery. His business goal is to expand his  business within 5 years. Previously he took loans of Kes 20,000 and 50,000 which he managed to repay.

loans.use: to buy stationery

loans.name: Edward

texts.en:
Edward is a 43-year-old farmer, who is widowed with two children. He has been rearing pigs and goats for the past two years with the monthly income of KES 19,700 which he uses to support his family. 



He is applying for his first loan term from KADET LTD after being introduced by an existing KADET customer. Edward will use the loan to buy animal feed for pigs and goats. 

With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to be a large-scale pig farmer.

loans.use: To buy animal feed for pigs and goats.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, cheese, beans, tomatoes, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Siempre hay nuevas oportunidades de vida y nuevos retos para ser mejores personas y este hombre tiene altas aspiraciones y deseos de salir adelante con la visión de ser ejemplo para su familia y personas quienes lo conocen a fin de superar la pobreza. Vive con su familia en un hogar humilde pero lleno de amor. Es un hombre trabajador, honesto, sincero y emprendedor, quienes lo conocen saben que es una buena persona dispuesta a ayudar a quien lo necesita. Con mucho esfuerzo logró instalar una venta de artículos ferreteros, en donde vende: pinturas, martillos, clavos, lijas, entre otros materiales necesarios para la construcción o reparaciones domésticas. Por ser un hombre amable y tener precios accesibles los clientes lo prefieren y siempre que tienen necesidad de comprar algo, lo buscan. El siente que necesita ampliar un poco su negocio, dada la demanda, lamentablemente no posee de capital necesario para llevar a cabo tal deseo, es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito con el cual pueda comprar: mas herramientas, pintura, madera, martillos, clavos, tuberias para drenajes, entre otros. Confía en Dios que pronto su sueño se podrá hacer realidad.
texts.en:
There are always new opportunities in life and new challenges to become better people. This man has high aspirations and the desire to succeed with his vision of being an example for his family and those who know him, in order to overcome poverty.

He lives with his family in a modest home which is full of love. He is a hardworking, honest, sincere, and enterprising man. Those who know him know that he is a good person, willing to help anyone who needs him.

With much effort, he managed to mount a hardware store, where he sells paint, hammers, nails, and sandpaper, along with other necessary materials for construction and home repair.

Because he is a friendly man and his prices are accessible, clients prefer him and come to him whenever they need to buy something. He feels that he needs to expand his business a bit, given the demand, but unfortunately he does not have the necessary capital to realize that wish. Therefore, he came to INTEGRAL to apply for a loan to buy more tools, such as paint, wood, hammers, nails, drainage pipes, among others. He trusts in God that his dream will soon come true.

loans.use: to buy more tools, such as paint, wood, hammers, and nails.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Por el mundo en el que vivimos, las personas desean ser ejemplo para muchos, y buscando así diferentes actividades que generen ingresos y entregarle un buen futuro a sus hijos, esta mujer quien vive con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos, lucha ante sus dos principales obstáculos, pobreza y violencia social, a fin de evitar que sus hijos sean víctima en el futuro inmediato de los mismos; es trabajadora y emprendedora, su mayor ilusión es entregarle un mejor futuro a sus hijos, quienes el día de mañana con seguridad lo agradecerán. Es amable, optimista siempre con ganas de ser mejor cada día. Ha logrado instalar con esfuerzo una tortillería, que es su fuente de ingresos, todos los días se levanta con el deseo de incrementar mas su pequeño negocio, para así obtener las ganancias que espera y sobre todo, que a sus hijos no les falte nada, pero no tiene el capital necesario para lo dicho, es por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y comprar: maíz  y materiales para hacer tortillas, confía en Dios que pronto su vida tendrá mejores expectativas y forjar un futuro prospero a su familia.
texts.en:
In the world we live in, people want to set an example for many and seek various activities that will generate income to provide a better future for their children.  This woman who lives with her life companion and two children struggles against her two main obstacles, poverty and a violence, in order to keep her children from becoming victims of them in the immediate future.  

She’s hardworking and enterprising and her greatest wish is to provide her children with a better future who no doubt will be grateful for it someday.  She’s kind, optimistic and always disposed to be better every day.

With much effort she’s succeeded in setting up a tortilla shop which is her source of income.  She rises every day with the hope of increasing her little business a bit more to earn the profits she yearns for and above all so that her children should want for nothing.  However, she does not have the necessary capital to do so which is why she approached Integral to request a loan to buy corn and supplies to make tortillas.  She trusts in God that her life will soon have better prospects and to forge a prosperous future for her family.

loans.use: to buy corn and supplies to make tortillas.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Siempre hay segundas oportunidades para todo aquel que necesita cambiar sus hábitos de vida, esta mujer es ejemplo de superación de pobreza y de que se puede evitar el entorno de violencia social cuando hay voluntad, tiene un grupo familiar bien constituido, mujer muy emprendedora, que no le importa darlo todo, con tal que sus hijos tengan lo necesario para vivir dignamente. Vende verduras y frutas de todo tipo en un mercado del país, y es así como ella se gana la vida a diario, es una mujer que por su manera de ser, las personas la prefieren, además de contar con precios accesibles y siempre ayudando a todo aquel que lo necesita. Tiene el deseo de ampliar su negocio pero no tiene como iniciar y comprar  mas verduras y frutas, es por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así poder comprar mas tomates, pepinos, repollos, rábanos entre otros. Espera recibir la ayuda para que pronto su vida y la de sus hijos tengan mejores expectativas.
texts.en:
For those who want to change their life habits there will always be second chances.  This woman is an example of overcoming poverty and being able to avoid the environment of social violence when there is the will to do so.  She has a well-integrated family unit.  She’s a very enterprising woman who does not hold back in giving her all so long as her children have everything they need to live with dignity.

She sells all types of vegetables and fruit in one of the country’s markets.  This is how she earns her living every day.  She’s a woman who is preferred by many thanks to the way she is.  In addition to having affordable prices she’s there to help all who need help.  

She wants to expand the business but lacks the means to start and to buy more fruit and vegetables which is why she approached Integral to request a loan to buy more tomatoes, cucumbers, cabbages and radishes, among others.  She hopes to get the help so that her and her children’s lives will soon have better prospects.

loans.use: to buy more tomatoes, cucumbers, cabbages, raddishes, oranges and papayas, among others.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Vive en una localidad con alta violencia social y espera cambiar esta realidad para sus hijos en un futuro cercano para que así ellos no sufran la influencia de la delincuencia, por ello se levanta cada día a brindar lo mejor de si, es muy conocida en la zona de residencia por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad, es muy dedicada a su labor y muy amable a la hora de vender y es asi como se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefieren por sus productos y sus buenos precios. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco mas la tienda y no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le ayude a comprar más productos como huevos, leche, golosinas, granos básicos, jabones entre otros. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada será dada y no tendrá más preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
She lives in a town with a lot of social violence and she hopes to change this reality for her children in the near future, so they don't suffer the influence of crime. Therefore, she gets up every day to give the best of her. She is very well known where she lives because of her humility and dedication to work. She never gave in and she always moves forward despite the difficulties. 

With effort and dedication, she has a store where she sells staples. She is very dedicated to her work and very friendly when selling. That's how she has made a lot of customers, who prefer her for the products and good prices. 

She feels the need to stock better her store, but she doesn't have the capital to do it. That's why she decided to request a loan to INTEGRAL to help her to buy more products such as eggs, milk, candies, basic grains, and soaps, among others. She is confident in God that the help requested will be provided soon and she will not have to worry about how to bring means of support to her home daily.

loans.use: to buy eggs, milk, candies, basic grains, and soaps.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Joven con enormes sueños y metas por cumplir, que se vale de su lancha para hacerlos posibles, desea superar un entorno saturado de violencia social y pobreza, a fin de ofrecer a su familia un futuro con mejores expectativas de vida, es padre de familia y ello ha hecho que se preocupe por los suyos. Es un hombre luchador, responsable y trabajador, además de ser atento y servicial, eso le ayuda a desempeñar sus actividades, ya que trabaja en una playa del país, con su lancha transporta a personas de un extremo a otro, es así como el cada mañana se dispone a trabajar con lo mejor que tiene para que el pan no falte en su hogar. Tiene necesidad de comprar repuestos para su lancha, y no tiene el capital para hacerlo. Es por eso, que se acerco a INTEGRAL a solicitar un crédito y poder comprar repuestos necesarios para que junto a su lancha puedan continuar brindando el servicio que sus clientes merecen, agradece anticipadamente la ayuda por recibir.
texts.en:
A young man with huge dreams and goals to meet who avails himself of his boat to reach them.  He wants to improve his environment that’s saturated with social violence and poverty aiming at providing his family with a future with better life prospects.  

He’s a father and this makes him concerned for his loved ones.   He’s a responsible, tenacious, hardworking man who is also attentive and service oriented.  This helps him carry out his activities because he works at one of the country’s beaches with his boat transporting people form one side to the other.  This is how he sets out every morning to work the best way he knows how so his home will not lack daily bread.

He needs to buy spare parts for his boat but does not have the capital to do so which is why he’s called on Integral to request a loan to buy spare parts needed so that he and his boat can continue providing the service his customers deserve.  He gives thanks in advance for the help he’s to receive.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Personas con deseo de salir adelante y superarse hay muchas y una de ellas es esta joven mujer que con esfuerzos ha logrado posicionarse y alcanzar lo que hasta hoy a logrado, es muy trabajadora, positiva y emprendedora, busca una vida nueva y completa alejada de la delincuencia, vive junto a su familia que son su pilar y tesoro mas preciado. Piensa que nunca es tarde para dar lo mejor de uno mismo y nunca ha decaído con sus ideas. Actualmente posee un salón de belleza y una venta de cosméticos, es muy conocida y ya tiene muchos clientes que la prefieren por la calidad de su labor y los buenos precios, últimamente aumento la demanda y es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL solicitando un crédito y así comprar utensilios de trabajo como secadora, plancha, tijeras y cosméticos a fin de renovar su equipo de trabajo y prestar un servicio de calidad superior. Confía que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez con la ayuda de Dios podrá ganarse una vida mejor para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
There are a lot of people with the desire to get ahead and improve themselves, and one of them is this young woman. With great effort she has managed to position herself and achieve what she has done up to today; she is very hard-working, positive, and entrepreneurial. She is looking for a new life far removed from crime. She lives together with her family, which is her rock and her most valuable treasure. She believes that it's never too late to give the best of yourself, and she has never gone off track with her ideas. 

Currently she owns a beauty salon and also sells cosmetics. She is well known and already has a lot of customers who prefer her for the quality of her work and good prices. Recently demand increased and that's why she went to INTEGRAL and requested a loan. This is to buy tools for her job, like a dryer, iron, scissors and cosmetics, with the goal of updating the tools of her trade to offer services of superior quality. She is confident that she will be able to pay back the debt and at the same time, with God's help, she will be able to earn a better life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy a dryer, iron, scissors and cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Mujer muy trabajadora, honesta y humilde, su mayor ilusión es entregarle un mejor futuro a su familia, busca reiniciarse pese a las adversidades que su entorno sufre debido a la preocupante situación violenta que vive el país, sus hijos son su fuerza para salir adelante cada día. Actualmente la clienta tiene un pequeño puesto donde vende tortillas y da gracias a Dios porque es muy preferida por sus clientes quienes la prefieren gracias a sus precios accesibles, higiene y buena atención, ahora ella desea ampliar un poco mas su negocio, pero no tiene el capital suficiente, es por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así comprar mas productos, es decir: Maíz, leña y gas propano. Espera contar con dicho préstamo a fin de poder realizar sus metas y sueños.
texts.en: [This borrower is a] very hard-working woman, honest and humble. Her greatest wish is to give her family a better future. She is seeking to resume [her business] despite the adversities that her environment suffers due to the troubling, violent situation that the country is experiencing. Her children are her force to advance every day. Now she has a little stand where she sells tortillas and gives thanks to God because she is preferred by her customers, who prefer her thanks to her affordable prices, hygiene, and good service. Now she wants to expand her business a little, but she doesn't have sufficient capital. This is why she has come to INTEGRAL to apply for a loan and thus buy more products, that is to say, corn, firewood, and propane gas. She hopes to have this loan to be able to achieve her goals and dreams.

loans.use: to buy corn and propane gas.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de ser ejemplo de su familia y todos aquellas personas que la miran, superando la difícil situación económica y violenta, es lo que hace admirar a esta mujer, quien es muy optimista y con claras ideas futuras para su negocio, actualmente su mayor ilusión es entregarle lo mejor a sus hijos, que tengan una vida en donde no les sobre ni les falte nada. Es luchadora, emprendedora y eso la hace ser una gran mujer para sus hijos. Actualmente vende ropa de forma ambulante, cada mañana se levanta con el deseo de terminar la venta del día y así poder llevarles el alimento diario a su hogar. Desea ampliar más su pequeña venta y es por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL porque ella no posee el capital necesario para realizar dicha meta y necesita comprar mas ropa como: blusas, pantalones, vestidos, camisas entre otros. Esta segura que venderá todo lo que se proponga y podrá saldar la deuda adquirida antes del tiempo acordado y así podrá  entregarle mejores condiciones de vida a su familia
texts.en: The desire to be an example for her family and everyone who observes her, overcoming the difficult economic situation and the violence, is what makes one admire this woman, who is very optimistic and has clear ideas for the future of her business. Now her greatest wish is to give the best to her children, so that they can have a life in which they have nothing unnecessary but don't lack for anything. She is hard-working, enterprising, and this makes her a great woman for her children. Now she sells clothing as a street vendor. Every morning she gets up with the desire to finish the day's sales and thus be able to bring the daily food to her household. She wants to expand her little business, and this is why she came to INTEGRAL, because she doesn't have the necessary capital to meet this goal, and she needs to buy more clothing such as blouses, pants, dresses, and shirts, among other items. She is sure that she will sell everything that is proposed and that she will be able pay off the debt she acquires before the agreed-upon time, and thus she will be able to offer better living conditions to her family.

loans.use: to buy blouses, pants, dresses, and shirts, among other items, to sell

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Es una mujer muy emprendedora que su mayor deseo es entregarle un mejor futuro a su familia queriendo tener nuevos horizontes y olvidarse de la delincuencia de la que es victima la zona en que reside. Tiene un grupo familiar por el cual se esmera todos los días, es muy trabajadora y desde hace cinco años se dedica a vender miel de abeja, se siente orgullosa porque ha logrado que le dé buenos resultados, tiene mucha clientela en un lugar que identifico como muy bueno para desarrollar sus actividades; con éstos ingresos ella le brinda el pan de cada día a su familia. Su deseo es tener mejores beneficios para que el día de mañana les entregue lo mejor a sus hijos que tanto la admiran por la entrega a su trabajo. Ella tiene la convicción de que si aumenta su mercadería así aumentarán las ventas y ganancias, es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así comprar miel de abeja por mayor. Agradece la colaboración que recibirá y confía en Dios que nunca la abandonará para ya no verse influenciada por malas compañías y estar siempre ocupada en obras buenas como éstas y así velar de la mejor manera por su familia y ser ejemplo de superación para ellos.
texts.en:
She’s a very enterprising woman whose main wish is to provide her family with a better future; she wants to find new horizons and forget the crime she’s a victim of in the zone she lives in.  She has a family group she strives for every day.  She’s very hardworking and for the last five years has been selling honey.  She feels proud because she’s gotten good results.  She has a large clientele in a place she identified as being good for developing her activity.  She’s able to provide daily bread for her family by means of this income.  Her wish is to earn higher profits so that in future she will be able to give all the best to her children who so admire her for her dedication to work.

She is convinced that if she were to increase her merchandise her sales and her profits would increase too which is why she’s approached Integral to request a loan to buy honey at wholesale.  She is grateful for the collaboration she’ll get and trusts in God that He’ll never abandon her so that she will not be influenced by bad relationships and she will always be busy doing good works like these to better watch over her family and be an example to others of self-improvement.

loans.use: to buy honey at wholesale.

loans.name: Reyes Orquidea

texts.es: Reyes Orquidea de 52 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus cinco hijos, tres de los cuales estudian y los otros dos trabajan ayudando en las labores del hogar y en los cultivos, viven en casa de su propiedad, muy emprendedora, le gusta trabajar ya que no solo cosecha maíz y frijol, también todos los años se encarga de criar cerdos y venderlos; posee mucha experiencia en lo que hace, esto le ha otorgado los beneficios de contar con una clientela fija que habla muy bien de ella, tiene muy buenas referencias y no posee deudas actualmente,  por lo cual solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito el cual le facilite la compra de los insumos necesarios para una siembra de maíz de doscientos metros cuadrados, asegura podrá cumplir con el pago del monto del crédito solicitado en las fechas establecidas. Reyes tiene la esperanza que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Reyes Orquidia is 52 years old. She lives with her life companion and their five children, three of whom are in school, and the other two work, helping her with household tasks and in the fields. They live in a house on their property. She is a very entrepreneurial person, she likes to work, she not only harvests corn and beans every year, she also takes charge of raising pigs and selling them. She has a lot of experience in what she does, and this has given her the benefit of having regular customers who speak very well of her. She has very good references and does not have a current loan, so for this reason she applied to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to purchase the necessary supplies to plant two hundred square meters of corn, and she assures that she will be able to comply with the payments for the loan amount she has applied for on the established dates. Reyes hopes that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds for corn and beans, compost, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Persona integra, humilde, honesta y sincera, cualidades que describen a esta mujer que desea reiniciar su vida, pese al entorno en el que vive con su grupo familiar, lleno de violencia social y carencias econímicas, su familia es su mayor tesoro e inspiración para hacer mejor cada día las cosas. Desde hace 5 años vende ropa y accesorios de forma ambulante, y dado que se encuentra en el último trimestre del año en que normalmente a aprendido que sus prendas son mas demandadas, necesita incrementar su inventario y comprar variedad de ropa. Es por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y poder comprar mas ropa y mercadería como: Blusas, chaquetas, pantalones, camisas, carteras, cinchos u otros, cuenta con buenas referencias de pago y siempre ha sido una mujer responsable con sus deudas, agradece a Dios porque esta segura que la ayuda será recibida y además pronto podrá saldarla.
texts.en:
She is a person of integrity, humility, honesty and sincerity. These qualities describe this woman that hopes to start her life over due to the environment in which she lives with her household filled with social violence and economic needs. Her family is her greatest treasure and her inspiration to improve things everyday. She has sold clothing and accessories for five years by traveling to make her sales. 

Given that she is now in the last three months of the years, which she has learned is when her apparel is normally at its highest demand, she needs to increase her inventory and buy a variety of clothing. It is for this reason that she approached Integral to request a loan to be able to buy more clothing and merchandise including blouses, jackets, pants, shirts, wallets, belt and other items. She has good payment references and has always been a very responsible woman with her debts. She thanks God because she is sure that she will receive help and soon be able to pay it back.

loans.use: to buy blouses, jackets, pants, shirts, wallets, belts and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Mujer con deseos de ofrecer mejores condiciones de vida a su familia, a fin de que no sufran un incremento de violencia social y vida de pobreza que actualmente oprime el lugar donde reside, es el principal motivo por el que decidió instalar un tienda donde vende articulos de primera necesidad a vecinos y personas que pasan por el lugar; posee abundante clientela, ofrece precios accesibles y variedad de artículos, pero hay productos con los que no cuenta y por ello siente el deseo y necesidad de ampliar su fuente de ingresos, es por eso, que se acerco a INTEGRAL solicitando un crédito para comprar de sus productos principalmente demandados: Leche, huevos, azúcar, arroz y frijoles, ya que ella no posee el capital necesario para seguir invirtiendo. Esta segura que podrá solventar la deuda adquirida y agradece de antemano a todas esas personas que de buen corazón le ayudaran.
texts.en: She is a woman with a desire to offer better conditions for her family so that they don't suffer from an increase in social violence and poverty that currently oppresses many in the place where the live. This is her main reason for deciding to install a store where she sells basic goods to her neighbors and passersby. She has an abundance of customers, offering accessible prices and a variety of items, but there are products that she doesn't have. She feels the desire and need to increase her source of income, which is why she came to INTEGRAL to ask for a loan to buy her most in-demand products: milk, eggs, sugar, rice and beans. She doesn't have the necessary capital to keep investing in her business. She is sure that she will be able to pay off the loan and gives thanks in advance to all of the good-hearted people who will help her.

loans.use: to buy milk, eggs, sugar, rice and beans.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de un joven que vive junto a su grupo familiar, el posee una panadería donde vende toda clase de pan dulce y salado quesadillas, pastelitos, cachitos, pan francés y otros, ya tiene algún tiempo con el negocio y eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, la panadería es muy conocida por las personas de la localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefieren por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y el servicio excelente; es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor todos los días lucha por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos horizontes y alejado de la violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en que reside, día a día se esta esforzando al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina, azúcar, dulce, leche, levadura, bandejas, etc. El joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá llevar a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
The desire to better himself is one of the most important dreams of a young man who lives next to his family. He owns a bakery where he sells all manner of sweet and savory bread: sweet cheese pound cake, pastries, stuffed croissants, French bread, etc. He has already had the business for some time and this has given him valuable experience in sales that allows him to obtain greater profits.The bakery is very well-known among the people in the town and he already has lots of customers who prefer his business for the quality of his products, his good prices and his excellent service. He is an enterprising man; he is dedicated to his work and struggles each day to achieve a better future with new horizons away from the social violence victimising the town in which he lives. Day by day he is doing his utmost as he is happy with his work and does not wish to disappoint his family. 

The demand for his products has increased in recent weeks and he needs to make a new investment; for this reason, he is requesting a loan from Integral, which will allow him to to buy flour, sugar, dulce (a type of sugarloaf), milk, yeast, trays, etc. The young man has good credit references and is very responsible. He says he will be able to settle the debt, and at the same time, has the hope that it will bring economic security to his home.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, dulce (a type of sugarloaf), milk, yeast, and trays

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Siempre las personas buscan superarse no importa el momento en que lo hagan, es el caso de esta mujer con grandes habilidades, honesta, emprendedora y muy trabajadora. Vive con su grupo familiar el cual es su principal fuente de inspiración. Desde hace algún  tiempo posee una pequeña tienda en su lugar de residencia donde vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, jabón entre otros, es muy surtida y la más conocida del lugar ya tiene mucha clientela y gracias a su manera de atender a los clientes la prefieren. Desea comprar mayor cantidad de productos, pero no posee el capital suficiente para hacerlo, es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un  crédito  para la compra de golosinas, granos básicos, bebidas, pan etc., Posee un buen récord de pago y cuenta con la satisfacción de que nunca le ha quedado mal a nadie. Agradece desde ya el apoyo que le brinden y espera que con ello también pueda darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: People always look for a way to improve themselves, it doesn't matter when it happens. This is the case of this woman with great abilities - honest, determined and very hardworking. She lives with her family which is her primary source of inspiration. For some time she has had a small store in her home where she sells basic goods like grains, milk, eggs, soap and other things. It's well stocked and the best-known in the area, and she has many customers who prefer her thanks to her good service. She wants to buy a greater volume of products but doesn't have enough capital to do it. For that reason she has asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy snacks, basic grains, drinks, bread, etc. She has a good credit record and the satisfaction of never having left anyone with outstanding debt. She is grateful for the support that is given to her and hopes that with it she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy snacks, basic grains, drinks and bread.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: En la vida existen momentos duros y difíciles pero el deseo de salir adelante siempre esta frente a nuestros ojos. Este hombre es un claro ejemplo de ello; vive junto a su familia quienes tienen el mejor deseo de que tenga éxito y un futuro mas prospero, sabe que nunca hay que dejarse vencer por las adversidades de la vida, aún rodeados de una fuerte violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en la que viven. Es un hombre muy trabajador y honesto con buenas relaciones en el lugar de residencia. El posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad se ha hecho de clientes que lo prefieren por la calidad y los buenos precios. Aumento la demanda en las últimas semanas y lamentablemente no tiene el capital suficiente para una nueva inversión en mercadería, por lo que solicita a INTEGRAL  un credito para la compra de granos basicos, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros. De esta forma le dará variedad a sus clientes, lograra mayores ganancias y a la vez tendrá fe que asi le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: In life, there are hard and difficult times, but the desire to make headway is always right in front of us. This man is a clear example of that. He lives with his family, for whom his biggest desire is for them to be successful and have a prosperous future. He knows that you can never let the adversities in life defeat you, even though he is surrounded by a very violent society where he lives. He is a hardworking and honest man with good relationships with his neighbors. He has a general store selling products of primary need, attracting customers looking for quality and good prices. Demand has increased in the past weeks, and sadly he doesn't have enough capital to purchase more supplies, so he is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Apoyo Integral to purchase basic grains, milk, eggs, bread and other items. In this way, he will give his customers more variety, increase his profits and have faith that he can give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, milk, eggs and bread.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en: Fatuma is a very devoted woman who has had several years of experience selling coconuts and makuti (palm fronds). She tells us that it has been a profitable business. Fatuma's aim is to continue to be in business so that she can have a more prosperous life. She is taking out this new loan to expand her business by adding additional stocks of coconuts and makuti for sale. In this way, she is sure that she will have good profits and move forward.

loans.use: to buy stock of coconuts and makuti (palm fronds) for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Deseos de vivir con nuevas aspiraciones y superación, son los de esta joven mujer luchadora, tenaz, que jamás se ha dejado vencer por las adversidades que la vida le ha presentado sean de pobreza o violencia social, vive junto a su grupo familiar sólidamente conformado, es su mayor tesoro y para quien desea ser ejemplo. Actualmente trabaja realizando flores artificiales,  es decir hechas a mano ya sea con diferentes tipos de papel, plásticos u otros materiales en ocasión de reciclaje. Desde pequeña aprendió de sus padres éste oficio y es así como hecha a andar éste legado día a día, ganándose el pan y hace de su vida un ejemplo para muchos, sobre todo su familia, quienes ven el esfuerzo que ella hace y quienes a la vez colaboran con ella en el negocio. Desea vender mayor cantidad de flores pero no tiene el capital para comprar suficiente materia prima, es por eso, que se acerco a INTEGRAL solicitando un crédito y poder comprar: diversos papeles, brillantina, alambre, pegamento y plásticos. Esta confiada de que la ayuda será brindada y pronto podrá cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
A desire to live with new goals and self improvement is what this young, tenacious, determined woman has.  She has never let herself be overcome by the adversity she has encountered in life, whether that be poverty or social violence.  She lives with her close-knit family group, which is her greatest treasure and reason to be exemplary.

Currently, she makes artificial flowers by hand in different kinds of paper, plastic or other recycled material.
